scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: find web/frontend/ -name '*.js' -type f -delete && find web/frontend/ -name '*.html' -type f -delete
scripts.lint: ./node_modules/.bin/tslint -c tslint.json $(find web/ -name '*.ts' -type f && find test/ -name '*.ts' -type f) --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: (cd test/backend && tsc) && npm run build:backend && mocha test/backend/src/
scripts.test:frontend: (cd test/frontend && tsc) && npm run build:frontend && mocha test/frontend/src/
scripts.sb:frontend: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.sb:backend: npm run build:backend && npm run start:backend
scripts.sb: npm run sb:backend && npm run sb:frontend
